testimonials.title: Success Stories
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our community has to say.

1.text: "TradeStarter made crypto so easy to understand! I went from complete beginner to confidently making my first trade in just two weeks."
1.author: Sarah M.

2.text: "The forex guides are incredibly clear and practical. I finally understand how currency pairs work and how to read charts properly."
2.author: James K.

3.text: "I've earned over $500 in free crypto from airdrops using the strategies taught here. The checklist feature is a game-changer!"
3.author: Maria L.

4.text: "I was always intimidated by technical analysis, but the step-by-step lessons here broke it down perfectly. Now I can read charts with confidence!"
4.author: David R.

5.text: "The community support is unmatched. Whenever I have a question about a specific airdrop or trade setup, someone is always there to help."
5.author: Elena P.

6.text: "Best free resource I've found. The tools and calculators save me so much time when planning my risk management for the week."
6.author: Michael J.

hours.title: Support Hours
hours.note: We typically respond within 24 hours during business days.

q1.a: Yes! All our educational content, tools, and resources are completely free. We believe in making crypto and forex education accessible to everyone.

q2.a: No, we provide educational content only. All information on TradeStarter is for educational purposes and should not be considered financial advice. Always do your own research.

q3.q: How do I get started with crypto?
q3.a: Start with our Crypto Basics page to learn the fundamentals. Then set up a wallet and start with small amounts to practice.

q4.a: We list popular airdrop opportunities, but always encourage you to do your own research. Never share private keys or send crypto to participate in airdrops.

q5.q: Can I suggest new content or features?
q5.a: Absolutely! We love hearing from our community. Use the contact form above or reach out on social media with your suggestions.

q6.a: Currently, we focus on providing free educational content. For personalized guidance, we recommend joining our community where experienced members share insights.

hero.title: Democratizing Financial Education For Everyone
hero.subtitle: We believe that understanding the financial markets shouldn't require a finance degree. TradeStarter is built to make learning crypto, forex, and airdrops simple, free, and accessible.

steps.title: How It Works
steps.subtitle: Your journey to financial literacy in four simple steps.

1.title: Choose a Path
1.desc: Select from Crypto, Forex, or Airdrops based on your interests and goals.

2.title: Learn Basics
2.desc: Read through our structured, beginner-friendly guides and lessons.

3.title: Use Tools
3.desc: Apply what you've learned using our calculators, trackers, and checklists.

4.title: Start Trading
4.desc: Confidently make your first moves in the market with a solid foundation.

mission.title: Why We Built TradeStarter
mission.p1: The world of finance is changing rapidly. Cryptocurrencies and decentralized finance (DeFi) are reshaping how we think about money. However, the barrier to entry remains high for many due to complex jargon and gatekeeping.
mission.p2: TradeStarter was created to bridge this gap. We strip away the noise and focus on the essentials. Whether you want to understand Bitcoin, trade currency pairs, or hunt for the next big airdrop, we provide the roadmap.
